query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auditLogs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userName VARCHAR(255),
  action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  entityType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  entityId INT,
  changes JSON,
  metadata JSON,
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45),
  userAgent TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 385B8cqVvDyKYq8.2ff4d9bc4b3d --database HoXBpYBQ3qbVm6g7qLEzMx --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auditLogs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userName VARCHAR(255),
  action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  entityType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  entityId INT,
  changes JSON,
  metadata JSON,
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45),
  userAgent TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
